text: Laura is a village in Tuscany, central Italy, administratively a frazione of the comune of Crespina Lorenzana, province of Pisa. Laura lies at the slopes of the hill of Lorenzana. It is about 24 km from Pisa and 8 km from the municipal seat of Crespina. == References == == Bibliography == * Category:Frazioni of the Province of Pisa
title: Laura, Crespina Lorenzana
